ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories

16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital Memory Card + Mini HDMI to HDMI 6 Foot Cable
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Carry Bag + 3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, Circular Polarizer and Flourescent Filter and Hard Case
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body & Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens + 16GB SDHC Deluxe Accessory Kit
